entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse. I'm not happy with it.
I understand. I can certainly help you with that. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF789234. Look, I don't have time for this. I just want to return the darn thing. It's a VeloBand Pulse, not a smart watch, just a fitness tracker. Should be simple.
Thank you. I have order #VF789234 here. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse. Could you tell me why you're looking to return it?
It's just… not what I expected. The heart rate monitor is wildly inaccurate! And I've only had it for a couple of weeks.

I'm sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with the VeloBand Pulse's performance. At VeloFit, we stand behind our products. Our return policy allows for returns up to 90 days from the date of purchase. Since you've only had it for a couple of weeks, you're well within that window.
90 days? Really? I thought I read something about a shorter period somewhere. But okay, great. So, how do I get the process started? This VeloBand Pulse is going back ASAP.

Absolutely. I'll generate a return shipping label for you right now. I'll send it to the email address associated with your account. Just repackage the VeloBand Pulse, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Will I get a full refund?

Yes, you will receive a full refund to your original method of payment once the returned VeloBand Pulse is received and processed at our warehouse. It usually takes 7-10 business days to process returns after they arrive. You will receive a confirmation email when the refund has been issued. We value you as a customer and want you to be happy with your VeloFit experience.
Okay, perfect. Thanks! I appreciate the help. The return policy being 90 days is a huge relief.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're very welcome. Have a great day!
